title: Daily Kanji Mobile&Wear
summary: Learn a kanji each day on your mobile or wear device!
description: Daily Kanji Mobile&Wear let you see informations about a kanji everyday both on your mobile phone and your android wear device!You will have initially 80 kanjis in your database and you can buy up to 1 thousand of them!You can also watch at your complete collection in a simple list :)Please, be sure to open the app on your phone before opening it on your wear device!
descriptionHTML:
Daily Kanji Mobile&Wear let you see informations about a kanji everyday both on your mobile phone and your android wear device!

You will have initially 80 kanjis in your database and you can buy up to 1 thousand of them!

You can also watch at your complete collection in a simple list :)

Please, be sure to open the app on your phone before opening it on your wear device!
